document_data.name: Wyvernlorn's Wayhouse
document_data.mainbody: '''Wyvernlorn's Wayhouse''' was an [[inn]] located in the city of [[Urmlaspyr]] in [[1358 DR]].
document_data.Location: The inn was located near Urmlaspyr's western gates.
document_data.Description: Though a bit derelict, Wyvernlorn's Wayhouse's accommodations were fair and the prices were cheap. This popular spot was always crowded.
